---
title: "Frederick Gathering of Eagles"
---

The Frederick Gathering of Eagles is a group for Eagle Scouts in Frederick County, Maryland. We welcome both adult and youth Eagles to join us for activities and networking opportunities.

### Become a member today!

We are currently seeking members to join our board and/or help develop activities for our group. There are multiple ways to contribute and qualify for membership:

* Be a registered Scout leader or youth
* Volunteer on the Frederick Gathering of Eagles Board or a committee
* Donate to the Frederick Gathering of Eagles

### We look forward to hearing from you!

Need the following:

* Contact information
* Calendar dates for upcoming board meetings
* Information on upcoming activities
